Our dining program offers all members of the NYU community a variety of options ranging from traditional dining in cafes located throughout the NYU campus to newly-designed dining rooms. Aside from fulfilling day-to-day dining needs, Dining Services also creates special occasion events and international menus to celebrate holidays during the academic year.        The Torch Club      New York University faculty, administrators, staff, alumni and NYU affiliates can gather socially over a meal, buffet selection or cocktail at the NYU Torch Club . The Torch Club features elegant menus that are updated seasonally by the Chef.   The Torch Club also provides the highest quality catering services for any occasion, private or University-related. All members of the NYU community can arrange a business lunch to hosting a large gathering in the lovely Restaurant, Tap Room or Meeting facilities. Our dining program offers all members of the NYU community a variety of options ranging from traditional dining in cafes located throughout the NYU campus to newly-designed dining rooms. Aside from fulfilling day-to-day dining needs, Dining Services also creates special occasion events and international menus to celebrate holidays during the academic year.        The Torch Club      New York University faculty, administrators, staff, alumni and NYU affiliates can gather socially over a meal, buffet selection or cocktail at the NYU Torch Club . The Torch Club features elegant menus that are updated seasonally by the Chef.   The Torch Club also provides the highest quality catering services for any occasion, private or University-related. All members of the NYU community can arrange a business lunch to hosting a large gathering in the lovely Restaurant, Tap Room or Meeting facilities. Below, we’ve listed two of our preeminent dining services.   Top of the Square Catering   Top of the Square Catering is the house caterer of the Kimmel Center—perfect for every occasion, from meeting refreshments to seated dinners with Chef Peter Bove’s famous entrees. Top of the Square offers an entire menu of sustainable foods , and all produce is delivered daily. Services available campus-wide.   Contact Top of the Square     60 Washington Square South  212-998-4690   topofthesquare@nyu.edu   Milton M. Sarmiento , Director, Top of the Square Catering  212-998-4694   Peter Bove, Executive Chef  212-998-4695   The Torch Club   Opened in 1999, the Torch Club is an event facility and restaurant open to the University and non-NYU guests. The Torch Club is available for university events and non-NYU private bookings.     Contact the Torch Club   18 Waverly Place  212-992-9155   torch.club@nyu.edu            Events in the Kimmel Center and in the Global Center for Academic and Spiritual Life are catered exclusively by Top of the Square Catering. The Torch Club is catered by house caterer, Restaurant Associates.                                              The Torch Club                                  Rosenthal Pavilion setup for a catered event, courtesy Top of the Square Catering.
